meanings: political scheme[tactic, strategy], political game[move], political maneuver
dollar diplomacy, a policy of bribing (one's way)

examples.korean: I suspect that he was dismissed for political reasons. 발음듣기 나는 그가 정략적인 이유 때문에 면직되었을 거라는 의심이 든다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I suspect that he was dismissed for political reasons. 발음

examples.korean: It is a measure dictated by political expediency. 발음듣기 그것은 일시적인 정략에서 나온 조치이다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It is a measure dictated by political expediency. 발음

examples.korean: a marriage of convenience 발음듣기 정략결혼(cf. mariage de convenance). Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
The politician made an expedient decision to vote for the tax cut. 발음듣기 그 정치가는 정략적인 발상에서 세금 감면에 찬성하는 표를 던지기로 결정했다. Neungyule
examples.english: The politician made an expedient decision to vote for the tax cut. 발음

examples.korean: The incident was politically exploited. 발음듣기 그 사건은 정략적으로 이용되었다 Neungyule
examples.english: The incident was politically exploited. 발음
